amendment.description: To authorize the Secretary of Defense to carry out a pilot program for providing cognitive rehabilitative therapy services under the TRICARE program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1768 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1768 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Graham. (consideration: CR S8005-8017; text: CR S8012) To authorize the Secretary of Defense to carry out a pilot program for providing cognitive rehabilitative therapy services under the TRICARE program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1768 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Graham.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1768 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
